Feel the luxury of living in this stunningly crafted 4 BHK apartment on sale at THE SIXTY THREE, a luxury residential complex in Sector 63, Gurgaon. Perfect for modern-day families, this expansive flat offers the ideal combination of luxury, convenience, and comfort.Property SpecificationsLocated on the 20th floor, this semi-furnished apartment has a spacious area to accommodate easy relaxation and entertainment. The apartment has four comfortable bedrooms, all beautifully crafted with comfort in mind. The master bedroom has classic Italian marble flooring, whereas the other bedrooms are completed with beautiful wooden flooring to create a cozy atmosphere.The apartment comes with four balconies, and every single one of them provides breathtaking vistas of the Aravalli hills, from where you can enjoy nature from the comfort of your own home. The modular kitchen is equipped with modern cabinets, chimney, hob, and piped gas supply to cook mouth-watering dishes to your heart's content.It is equipped with five bathrooms, all of a Western modern theme, and the modern fittings, such as geysers and shower cubicles, for extra convenience. The flat is Vaastu compliant, with the main door opening to the East, for a good living environment.FacilitiesThis apartment is well-fitted with basic electrical fittings like lights and fans to make living comfortable in the entire area. You shall also enjoy the guarantee of 100% power backup to prevent any interruptions in your routine activities.Residents of THE SIXTY THREE benefit from a smorgasbord of amenities befitting a five-star hotel, such as a clubhouse, swimming pool, and range of recreational facilities, making your lifestyle better and offering the prospect for relaxation and social interaction. The complex has three designated covered carpark lots in the basement, ensuring your car parking for your vehicles.Safety is the highest concern in this complex, with CCTV cameras covering the entire area and well-trained security staff available to ensure your safety.LocalityStrategically located in Gurgaon, this apartment is close to all the facilities. Prominent schools such as Heritage School, Shri Ram School, and St. Xavier's School are within easy reach, making the location family-friendly. Worldmark and other shopping malls and complexes are easily accessible, offering facilities for shopping and dining.The public transport connectivity is also very good, with nearby metro and railway stations that facilitate easy commutes to work. Even buses and auto-rickshaws are easily available, which facilitate easy travel within the city.

Property Specifications Explore this beautifully crafted 3 BHK semi-furnished flat for sale in Sector 70, Gurgaon. With a super built-up area of 1137 sq. ft., this ready-to-move property offers spacious and comfortable living. Priced at 1.5 Cr, it presents a great investment opportunity in a prime location. Modern, well-connected, and thoughtfully designed, its the perfect home for families or savvy investors. Facilities Experience modern living in this spacious 3 BHK unfurnished flat in Tulip Orange, Gurgaon. Thoughtfully designed, it features three bedrooms, two bathrooms, two balconies, and a living-cum-dining area, offering both comfort and functionality. The property comes with one lift, dedicated parking, 24 hours and all 7 days water supply, power backup, security, and is Vastu compliant. Ideal for homebuyers seeking a serene yet well-connected lifestyle. Locality Conveniently located on the ground floor of a well-maintained 14 storey building, this thoughtfully designed flat ensures effortless access ideal for families with children and senior citizens. Nestled in a prime area near the renowned Eppic Mall, it boasts close proximity to reputed educational institutes, vibrant shopping centers, and essential daily conveniences. Surrounded by a green, peaceful environment, the property offers a perfect harmony of urban connectivity and serene living, making it an excellent choice for discerning homebuyers.

It has a super built-up area of 1133 sq.ft. and a south face, hence bright and Vaastu compliant.The flat is equipped with two large bedrooms and two bathrooms one attached and one shared, both equipped with western fittings and geyser points. The house also has three balconies one for a bedroom, one for the living room, and one for the kitchen. Offering a blend of luxurious living, lush green surroundings, and outstanding connectivity, this Freehold Plot for sale at Plot No. A-52/2, DLF City, Phase 1, Gurgaon, presents an exceptional opportunity for discerning buyers. Spanning 502 square yards, this plot is situated in one of Gurgaon's most esteemed neighborhoods, making it an ideal canvas for your dream home. Its unique combination of exclusivity, accessibility, and proximity to essential amenities sets it apart for residential development.Property Specifications and FacilitiesThis expansive plot provides ample space for creating a bespoke and lavish residence, with one side open for easy access right from the road. Set within a well-established community, the area boasts a tranquil atmosphere while reflecting an upscale neighborhood vibe. Governed by local construction regulations, the plot allows for creative architectural design while maintaining harmony within the vicinity, making it exclusively suitable for residential purposes. Equipped with vital utilities, this plot is ready for immediate construction. You can expect a continuous supply of water, electricity, and a reliable drainage system that enhances its appeal. Its west-facing orientation further adds to its desirability for residential projects, providing a perfect balance of comfort and aesthetic charm.LocalityLocated in the highly sought-after DLF City Phase 1, this plot is surrounded by a wealth of essential services. Renowned schools and high-quality hospitals are just a kilometer away, ensuring that educational and healthcare needs are easily met. For shopping and leisure, premier malls and supermarkets are only minutes away. Additionally, nearby banks and ATM centers cater to financial requirements, while the area boasts excellent public transport links, with the Yellow Line Metro Station conveniently located just 1.5 kilometers away. This prime location truly caters to a modern lifestyle!

Feel the luxury of living in this stunningly crafted 4 BHK apartment on sale at THE SIXTY THREE, a luxury residential complex in Sector 63, Gurgaon. Perfect for modern-day families, this expansive flat offers the ideal combination of luxury, convenience, and comfort.Property SpecificationsLocated on the 20th floor, this semi-furnished apartment has a spacious area to accommodate easy relaxation and entertainment. The apartment has four comfortable bedrooms, all beautifully crafted with comfort in mind. The master bedroom has classic Italian marble flooring, whereas the other bedrooms are completed with beautiful wooden flooring to create a cozy atmosphere.The apartment comes with four balconies, and every single one of them provides breathtaking vistas of the Aravalli hills, from where you can enjoy nature from the comfort of your own home. The modular kitchen is equipped with modern cabinets, chimney, hob, and piped gas supply to cook mouth-watering dishes to your heart's content.It is equipped with five bathrooms, all of a Western modern theme, and the modern fittings, such as geysers and shower cubicles, for extra convenience. The flat is Vaastu compliant, with the main door opening to the East, for a good living environment.FacilitiesThis apartment is well-fitted with basic electrical fittings like lights and fans to make living comfortable in the entire area. You shall also enjoy the guarantee of 100% power backup to prevent any interruptions in your routine activities.Residents of THE SIXTY THREE benefit from a smorgasbord of amenities befitting a five-star hotel, such as a clubhouse, swimming pool, and range of recreational facilities, making your lifestyle better and offering the prospect for relaxation and social interaction. The complex has three designated covered carpark lots in the basement, ensuring your car parking for your vehicles.Safety is the highest concern in this complex, with CCTV cameras covering the entire area and well-trained security staff available to ensure your safety.LocalityStrategically located in Gurgaon, this apartment is close to all the facilities. Prominent schools such as Heritage School, Shri Ram School, and St. Xavier's School are within easy reach, making the location family-friendly. Worldmark and other shopping malls and complexes are easily accessible, offering facilities for shopping and dining.The public transport connectivity is also very good, with nearby metro and railway stations that facilitate easy commutes to work. Even buses and auto-rickshaws are easily available, which facilitate easy travel within the city.

Surrounded by a green, peaceful environment, the property offers a perfect harmony of urban connectivity and serene living, making it an excellent choice for discerning homebuyers.

Situated in a prime area of New Gurgaon, this 2 BHK flat in Sector 82 provides comfort, convenience and contemporary living. Buy this flat if you want to live a comfortable and memorable life with your family.Property Specifications - Situated on the 2nd floor of a 2-storey building, this corner unit is three sides open, receiving good natural light and fresh air during the day. It has a super built-up area of 1133 sq.ft. and a south face, hence bright and Vaastu compliant.The flat is equipped with two large bedrooms and two bathrooms one attached and one shared, both equipped with western fittings and geyser points. The house also has three balconies one for a bedroom, one for the living room, and one for the kitchen. All three balconies have shades to cover them for privacy as well as protection from the rain, and they have a view of greenery and the nearby park.Living and dining are clubbed into a single open area, ideal to lounge around and spend quality time with the family. The modular kitchen is equipped with overhead cabinets, piped gas connection, and a utility area extension, making it practical as well as convenient. Vitrified tile flooring has been incorporated throughout the home for a sleek, contemporary appearance.Facilities- The building has open parking, 24-hour water supply, 100 power backup, and a security guard for your safety. It is part of a calm and well-connected neighborhood, with easy access to everything you need.

Spanning 502 square yards, this plot is situated in one of Gurgaon's most esteemed neighborhoods, making it an ideal canvas for your dream home. Its unique combination of exclusivity, accessibility, and proximity to essential amenities sets it apart for residential development.Property Specifications and FacilitiesThis expansive plot provides ample space for creating a bespoke and lavish residence, with one side open for easy access right from the road. Set within a well-established community, the area boasts a tranquil atmosphere while reflecting an upscale neighborhood vibe. Governed by local construction regulations, the plot allows for creative architectural design while maintaining harmony within the vicinity, making it exclusively suitable for residential purposes. For shopping and leisure, premier malls and supermarkets are only minutes away. Additionally, nearby banks and ATM centers cater to financial requirements, while the area boasts excellent public transport links, with the Yellow Line Metro Station conveniently located just 1.5 kilometers away. This prime location truly caters to a modern lifestyle!

Feel the luxury of living in this stunningly crafted 4 BHK apartment on sale at THE SIXTY THREE, a luxury residential complex in Sector 63, Gurgaon. Perfect for modern-day families, this expansive flat offers the ideal combination of luxury, convenience, and comfort.Property SpecificationsLocated on the 20th floor, this semi-furnished apartment has a spacious area to accommodate easy relaxation and entertainment. The apartment has four comfortable bedrooms, all beautifully crafted with comfort in mind. The master bedroom has classic Italian marble flooring, whereas the other bedrooms are completed with beautiful wooden flooring to create a cozy atmosphere.The apartment comes with four balconies, and every single one of them provides breathtaking vistas of the Aravalli hills, from where you can enjoy nature from the comfort of your own home. The modular kitchen is equipped with modern cabinets, chimney, hob, and piped gas supply to cook mouth-watering dishes to your heart's content.It is equipped with five bathrooms, all of a Western modern theme, and the modern fittings, such as geysers and shower cubicles, for extra convenience. The flat is Vaastu compliant, with the main door opening to the East, for a good living environment.FacilitiesThis apartment is well-fitted with basic electrical fittings like lights and fans to make living comfortable in the entire area. You shall also enjoy the guarantee of 100% power backup to prevent any interruptions in your routine activities.Residents of THE SIXTY THREE benefit from a smorgasbord of amenities befitting a five-star hotel, such as a clubhouse, swimming pool, and range of recreational facilities, making your lifestyle better and offering the prospect for relaxation and social interaction. The complex has three designated covered carpark lots in the basement, ensuring your car parking for your vehicles.Safety is the highest concern in this complex, with CCTV cameras covering the entire area and well-trained security staff available to ensure your safety.LocalityStrategically located in Gurgaon, this apartment is close to all the facilities. Prominent schools such as Heritage School, Shri Ram School, and St. Xavier's School are within easy reach, making the location family-friendly. Worldmark and other shopping malls and complexes are easily accessible, offering facilities for shopping and dining.The public transport connectivity is also very good, with nearby metro and railway stations that facilitate easy commutes to work. Even buses and auto-rickshaws are easily available, which facilitate easy travel within the city.

Situated in a prime area of New Gurgaon, this 2 BHK flat in Sector 82 provides comfort, convenience and contemporary living. Buy this flat if you want to live a comfortable and memorable life with your family.Property Specifications - Situated on the 2nd floor of a 2-storey building, this corner unit is three sides open, receiving good natural light and fresh air during the day. It has a super built-up area of 1133 sq.ft. and a south face, hence bright and Vaastu compliant.The flat is equipped with two large bedrooms and two bathrooms one attached and one shared, both equipped with western fittings and geyser points. The house also has three balconies one for a bedroom, one for the living room, and one for the kitchen. Offering a blend of luxurious living, lush green surroundings, and outstanding connectivity, this Freehold Plot for sale at Plot No. A-52/2, DLF City, Phase 1, Gurgaon, presents an exceptional opportunity for discerning buyers. Spanning 502 square yards, this plot is situated in one of Gurgaon's most esteemed neighborhoods, making it an ideal canvas for your dream home. Its unique combination of exclusivity, accessibility, and proximity to essential amenities sets it apart for residential development.Property Specifications and FacilitiesThis expansive plot provides ample space for creating a bespoke and lavish residence, with one side open for easy access right from the road. Set within a well-established community, the area boasts a tranquil atmosphere while reflecting an upscale neighborhood vibe. Governed by local construction regulations, the plot allows for creative architectural design while maintaining harmony within the vicinity, making it exclusively suitable for residential purposes. Equipped with vital utilities, this plot is ready for immediate construction. You can expect a continuous supply of water, electricity, and a reliable drainage system that enhances its appeal. Its west-facing orientation further adds to its desirability for residential projects, providing a perfect balance of comfort and aesthetic charm.LocalityLocated in the highly sought-after DLF City Phase 1, this plot is surrounded by a wealth of essential services. Renowned schools and high-quality hospitals are just a kilometer away, ensuring that educational and healthcare needs are easily met. For shopping and leisure, premier malls and supermarkets are only minutes away. Additionally, nearby banks and ATM centers cater to financial requirements, while the area boasts excellent public transport links, with the Yellow Line Metro Station conveniently located just 1.5 kilometers away. This prime location truly caters to a modern lifestyle!

Feel the luxury of living in this stunningly crafted 4 BHK apartment on sale at THE SIXTY THREE, a luxury residential complex in Sector 63, Gurgaon. Perfect for modern-day families, this expansive flat offers the ideal combination of luxury, convenience, and comfort.Property SpecificationsLocated on the 20th floor, this semi-furnished apartment has a spacious area to accommodate easy relaxation and entertainment. The apartment has four comfortable bedrooms, all beautifully crafted with comfort in mind. The master bedroom has classic Italian marble flooring, whereas the other bedrooms are completed with beautiful wooden flooring to create a cozy atmosphere.The apartment comes with four balconies, and every single one of them provides breathtaking vistas of the Aravalli hills, from where you can enjoy nature from the comfort of your own home. The modular kitchen is equipped with modern cabinets, chimney, hob, and piped gas supply to cook mouth-watering dishes to your heart's content.It is equipped with five bathrooms, all of a Western modern theme, and the modern fittings, such as geysers and shower cubicles, for extra convenience. The flat is Vaastu compliant, with the main door opening to the East, for a good living environment.FacilitiesThis apartment is well-fitted with basic electrical fittings like lights and fans to make living comfortable in the entire area. You shall also enjoy the guarantee of 100% power backup to prevent any interruptions in your routine activities.Residents of THE SIXTY THREE benefit from a smorgasbord of amenities befitting a five-star hotel, such as a clubhouse, swimming pool, and range of recreational facilities, making your lifestyle better and offering the prospect for relaxation and social interaction. The complex has three designated covered carpark lots in the basement, ensuring your car parking for your vehicles.Safety is the highest concern in this complex, with CCTV cameras covering the entire area and well-trained security staff available to ensure your safety.LocalityStrategically located in Gurgaon, this apartment is close to all the facilities. Prominent schools such as Heritage School, Shri Ram School, and St. Xavier's School are within easy reach, making the location family-friendly. Worldmark and other shopping malls and complexes are easily accessible, offering facilities for shopping and dining.The public transport connectivity is also very good, with nearby metro and railway stations that facilitate easy commutes to work. Even buses and auto-rickshaws are easily available, which facilitate easy travel within the city.

Property Specifications Explore this beautifully crafted 3 BHK semi-furnished flat for sale in Sector 70, Gurgaon. With a super built-up area of 1137 sq. ft., this ready-to-move property offers spacious and comfortable living. Priced at 1.5 Cr, it presents a great investment opportunity in a prime location. Modern, well-connected, and thoughtfully designed, its the perfect home for families or savvy investors. Facilities Experience modern living in this spacious 3 BHK unfurnished flat in Tulip Orange, Gurgaon. Thoughtfully designed, it features three bedrooms, two bathrooms, two balconies, and a living-cum-dining area, offering both comfort and functionality. The property comes with one lift, dedicated parking, 24 hours and all 7 days water supply, power backup, security, and is Vastu compliant. Nestled in a prime area near the renowned Eppic Mall, it boasts close proximity to reputed educational institutes, vibrant shopping centers, and essential daily conveniences. Surrounded by a green, peaceful environment, the property offers a perfect harmony of urban connectivity and serene living, making it an excellent choice for discerning homebuyers.

Situated in a prime area of New Gurgaon, this 2 BHK flat in Sector 82 provides comfort, convenience and contemporary living. Buy this flat if you want to live a comfortable and memorable life with your family.Property Specifications - Situated on the 2nd floor of a 2-storey building, this corner unit is three sides open, receiving good natural light and fresh air during the day. It has a super built-up area of 1133 sq.ft. and a south face, hence bright and Vaastu compliant.The flat is equipped with two large bedrooms and two bathrooms one attached and one shared, both equipped with western fittings and geyser points. The house also has three balconies one for a bedroom, one for the living room, and one for the kitchen. All three balconies have shades to cover them for privacy as well as protection from the rain, and they have a view of greenery and the nearby park.Living and dining are clubbed into a single open area, ideal to lounge around and spend quality time with the family. The modular kitchen is equipped with overhead cabinets, piped gas connection, and a utility area extension, making it practical as well as convenient. Vitrified tile flooring has been incorporated throughout the home for a sleek, contemporary appearance.Facilities- The building has open parking, 24-hour water supply, 100 power backup, and a security guard for your safety. It is part of a calm and well-connected neighborhood, with easy access to everything you need.

The house also has three balconies one for a bedroom, one for the living room, and one for the kitchen. All three balconies have shades to cover them for privacy as well as protection from the rain, and they have a view of greenery and the nearby park.Living and dining are clubbed into a single open area, ideal to lounge around and spend quality time with the family. The modular kitchen is equipped with overhead cabinets, piped gas connection, and a utility area extension, making it practical as well as convenient. Vitrified tile flooring has been incorporated throughout the home for a sleek, contemporary appearance.Facilities- The building has open parking, 24-hour water supply, 100 power backup, and a security guard for your safety. Offering a blend of luxurious living, lush green surroundings, and outstanding connectivity, this Freehold Plot for sale at Plot No. A-52/2, DLF City, Phase 1, Gurgaon, presents an exceptional opportunity for discerning buyers. Spanning 502 square yards, this plot is situated in one of Gurgaon's most esteemed neighborhoods, making it an ideal canvas for your dream home. Its unique combination of exclusivity, accessibility, and proximity to essential amenities sets it apart for residential development.Property Specifications and FacilitiesThis expansive plot provides ample space for creating a bespoke and lavish residence, with one side open for easy access right from the road. Set within a well-established community, the area boasts a tranquil atmosphere while reflecting an upscale neighborhood vibe. Governed by local construction regulations, the plot allows for creative architectural design while maintaining harmony within the vicinity, making it exclusively suitable for residential purposes. Equipped with vital utilities, this plot is ready for immediate construction. You can expect a continuous supply of water, electricity, and a reliable drainage system that enhances its appeal. Its west-facing orientation further adds to its desirability for residential projects, providing a perfect balance of comfort and aesthetic charm.LocalityLocated in the highly sought-after DLF City Phase 1, this plot is surrounded by a wealth of essential services. Renowned schools and high-quality hospitals are just a kilometer away, ensuring that educational and healthcare needs are easily met. For shopping and leisure, premier malls and supermarkets are only minutes away. Additionally, nearby banks and ATM centers cater to financial requirements, while the area boasts excellent public transport links, with the Yellow Line Metro Station conveniently located just 1.5 kilometers away. This prime location truly caters to a modern lifestyle!

Feel the luxury of living in this stunningly crafted 4 BHK apartment on sale at THE SIXTY THREE, a luxury residential complex in Sector 63, Gurgaon. Perfect for modern-day families, this expansive flat offers the ideal combination of luxury, convenience, and comfort.Property SpecificationsLocated on the 20th floor, this semi-furnished apartment has a spacious area to accommodate easy relaxation and entertainment. The apartment has four comfortable bedrooms, all beautifully crafted with comfort in mind. The master bedroom has classic Italian marble flooring, whereas the other bedrooms are completed with beautiful wooden flooring to create a cozy atmosphere.The apartment comes with four balconies, and every single one of them provides breathtaking vistas of the Aravalli hills, from where you can enjoy nature from the comfort of your own home. The modular kitchen is equipped with modern cabinets, chimney, hob, and piped gas supply to cook mouth-watering dishes to your heart's content.It is equipped with five bathrooms, all of a Western modern theme, and the modern fittings, such as geysers and shower cubicles, for extra convenience. The flat is Vaastu compliant, with the main door opening to the East, for a good living environment.FacilitiesThis apartment is well-fitted with basic electrical fittings like lights and fans to make living comfortable in the entire area. You shall also enjoy the guarantee of 100% power backup to prevent any interruptions in your routine activities.Residents of THE SIXTY THREE benefit from a smorgasbord of amenities befitting a five-star hotel, such as a clubhouse, swimming pool, and range of recreational facilities, making your lifestyle better and offering the prospect for relaxation and social interaction. The complex has three designated covered carpark lots in the basement, ensuring your car parking for your vehicles.Safety is the highest concern in this complex, with CCTV cameras covering the entire area and well-trained security staff available to ensure your safety.LocalityStrategically located in Gurgaon, this apartment is close to all the facilities. Prominent schools such as Heritage School, Shri Ram School, and St. Xavier's School are within easy reach, making the location family-friendly. Worldmark and other shopping malls and complexes are easily accessible, offering facilities for shopping and dining.The public transport connectivity is also very good, with nearby metro and railway stations that facilitate easy commutes to work. Even buses and auto-rickshaws are easily available, which facilitate easy travel within the city.

With a super built-up area of 1137 sq. ft., this ready-to-move property offers spacious and comfortable living. Priced at 1.5 Cr, it presents a great investment opportunity in a prime location. Modern, well-connected, and thoughtfully designed, its the perfect home for families or savvy investors. Facilities Experience modern living in this spacious 3 BHK unfurnished flat in Tulip Orange, Gurgaon. Thoughtfully designed, it features three bedrooms, two bathrooms, two balconies, and a living-cum-dining area, offering both comfort and functionality. Nestled in a prime area near the renowned Eppic Mall, it boasts close proximity to reputed educational institutes, vibrant shopping centers, and essential daily conveniences. Surrounded by a green, peaceful environment, the property offers a perfect harmony of urban connectivity and serene living, making it an excellent choice for discerning homebuyers.

Offering a blend of luxurious living, lush green surroundings, and outstanding connectivity, this Freehold Plot for sale at Plot No. A-52/2, DLF City, Phase 1, Gurgaon, presents an exceptional opportunity for discerning buyers. Spanning 502 square yards, this plot is situated in one of Gurgaon's most esteemed neighborhoods, making it an ideal canvas for your dream home. Its unique combination of exclusivity, accessibility, and proximity to essential amenities sets it apart for residential development.Property Specifications and FacilitiesThis expansive plot provides ample space for creating a bespoke and lavish residence, with one side open for easy access right from the road. Set within a well-established community, the area boasts a tranquil atmosphere while reflecting an upscale neighborhood vibe. Governed by local construction regulations, the plot allows for creative architectural design while maintaining harmony within the vicinity, making it exclusively suitable for residential purposes. Equipped with vital utilities, this plot is ready for immediate construction. You can expect a continuous supply of water, electricity, and a reliable drainage system that enhances its appeal. Its west-facing orientation further adds to its desirability for residential projects, providing a perfect balance of comfort and aesthetic charm.LocalityLocated in the highly sought-after DLF City Phase 1, this plot is surrounded by a wealth of essential services. Renowned schools and high-quality hospitals are just a kilometer away, ensuring that educational and healthcare needs are easily met. For shopping and leisure, premier malls and supermarkets are only minutes away. Additionally, nearby banks and ATM centers cater to financial requirements, while the area boasts excellent public transport links, with the Yellow Line Metro Station conveniently located just 1.5 kilometers away. This prime location truly caters to a modern lifestyle!

Feel the luxury of living in this stunningly crafted 4 BHK apartment on sale at THE SIXTY THREE, a luxury residential complex in Sector 63, Gurgaon. Perfect for modern-day families, this expansive flat offers the ideal combination of luxury, convenience, and comfort.Property SpecificationsLocated on the 20th floor, this semi-furnished apartment has a spacious area to accommodate easy relaxation and entertainment. The apartment has four comfortable bedrooms, all beautifully crafted with comfort in mind. The master bedroom has classic Italian marble flooring, whereas the other bedrooms are completed with beautiful wooden flooring to create a cozy atmosphere.The apartment comes with four balconies, and every single one of them provides breathtaking vistas of the Aravalli hills, from where you can enjoy nature from the comfort of your own home. The modular kitchen is equipped with modern cabinets, chimney, hob, and piped gas supply to cook mouth-watering dishes to your heart's content.It is equipped with five bathrooms, all of a Western modern theme, and the modern fittings, such as geysers and shower cubicles, for extra convenience. The flat is Vaastu compliant, with the main door opening to the East, for a good living environment.FacilitiesThis apartment is well-fitted with basic electrical fittings like lights and fans to make living comfortable in the entire area. You shall also enjoy the guarantee of 100% power backup to prevent any interruptions in your routine activities.Residents of THE SIXTY THREE benefit from a smorgasbord of amenities befitting a five-star hotel, such as a clubhouse, swimming pool, and range of recreational facilities, making your lifestyle better and offering the prospect for relaxation and social interaction. The complex has three designated covered carpark lots in the basement, ensuring your car parking for your vehicles.Safety is the highest concern in this complex, with CCTV cameras covering the entire area and well-trained security staff available to ensure your safety.LocalityStrategically located in Gurgaon, this apartment is close to all the facilities. Prominent schools such as Heritage School, Shri Ram School, and St. Xavier's School are within easy reach, making the location family-friendly. Worldmark and other shopping malls and complexes are easily accessible, offering facilities for shopping and dining.The public transport connectivity is also very good, with nearby metro and railway stations that facilitate easy commutes to work. Even buses and auto-rickshaws are easily available, which facilitate easy travel within the city.

With a super built-up area of 1137 sq. ft., this ready-to-move property offers spacious and comfortable living. Priced at 1.5 Cr, it presents a great investment opportunity in a prime location. Modern, well-connected, and thoughtfully designed, its the perfect home for families or savvy investors. Facilities Experience modern living in this spacious 3 BHK unfurnished flat in Tulip Orange, Gurgaon. Thoughtfully designed, it features three bedrooms, two bathrooms, two balconies, and a living-cum-dining area, offering both comfort and functionality. The property comes with one lift, dedicated parking, 24 hours and all 7 days water supply, power backup, security, and is Vastu compliant. Nestled in a prime area near the renowned Eppic Mall, it boasts close proximity to reputed educational institutes, vibrant shopping centers, and essential daily conveniences. Surrounded by a green, peaceful environment, the property offers a perfect harmony of urban connectivity and serene living, making it an excellent choice for discerning homebuyers.

Situated in a prime area of New Gurgaon, this 2 BHK flat in Sector 82 provides comfort, convenience and contemporary living. Buy this flat if you want to live a comfortable and memorable life with your family.Property Specifications - Situated on the 2nd floor of a 2-storey building, this corner unit is three sides open, receiving good natural light and fresh air during the day. It has a super built-up area of 1133 sq.ft. and a south face, hence bright and Vaastu compliant.The flat is equipped with two large bedrooms and two bathrooms one attached and one shared, both equipped with western fittings and geyser points. The house also has three balconies one for a bedroom, one for the living room, and one for the kitchen. All three balconies have shades to cover them for privacy as well as protection from the rain, and they have a view of greenery and the nearby park.Living and dining are clubbed into a single open area, ideal to lounge around and spend quality time with the family. Offering a blend of luxurious living, lush green surroundings, and outstanding connectivity, this Freehold Plot for sale at Plot No. A-52/2, DLF City, Phase 1, Gurgaon, presents an exceptional opportunity for discerning buyers. Spanning 502 square yards, this plot is situated in one of Gurgaon's most esteemed neighborhoods, making it an ideal canvas for your dream home. Its unique combination of exclusivity, accessibility, and proximity to essential amenities sets it apart for residential development.Property Specifications and FacilitiesThis expansive plot provides ample space for creating a bespoke and lavish residence, with one side open for easy access right from the road. Set within a well-established community, the area boasts a tranquil atmosphere while reflecting an upscale neighborhood vibe. Governed by local construction regulations, the plot allows for creative architectural design while maintaining harmony within the vicinity, making it exclusively suitable for residential purposes. Equipped with vital utilities, this plot is ready for immediate construction. You can expect a continuous supply of water, electricity, and a reliable drainage system that enhances its appeal. Its west-facing orientation further adds to its desirability for residential projects, providing a perfect balance of comfort and aesthetic charm.LocalityLocated in the highly sought-after DLF City Phase 1, this plot is surrounded by a wealth of essential services. Renowned schools and high-quality hospitals are just a kilometer away, ensuring that educational and healthcare needs are easily met. For shopping and leisure, premier malls and supermarkets are only minutes away. Additionally, nearby banks and ATM centers cater to financial requirements, while the area boasts excellent public transport links, with the Yellow Line Metro Station conveniently located just 1.5 kilometers away. This prime location truly caters to a modern lifestyle!

Feel the luxury of living in this stunningly crafted 4 BHK apartment on sale at THE SIXTY THREE, a luxury residential complex in Sector 63, Gurgaon. Perfect for modern-day families, this expansive flat offers the ideal combination of luxury, convenience, and comfort.Property SpecificationsLocated on the 20th floor, this semi-furnished apartment has a spacious area to accommodate easy relaxation and entertainment. The apartment has four comfortable bedrooms, all beautifully crafted with comfort in mind. The master bedroom has classic Italian marble flooring, whereas the other bedrooms are completed with beautiful wooden flooring to create a cozy atmosphere.The apartment comes with four balconies, and every single one of them provides breathtaking vistas of the Aravalli hills, from where you can enjoy nature from the comfort of your own home. The modular kitchen is equipped with modern cabinets, chimney, hob, and piped gas supply to cook mouth-watering dishes to your heart's content.It is equipped with five bathrooms, all of a Western modern theme, and the modern fittings, such as geysers and shower cubicles, for extra convenience. The flat is Vaastu compliant, with the main door opening to the East, for a good living environment.FacilitiesThis apartment is well-fitted with basic electrical fittings like lights and fans to make living comfortable in the entire area. You shall also enjoy the guarantee of 100% power backup to prevent any interruptions in your routine activities.Residents of THE SIXTY THREE benefit from a smorgasbord of amenities befitting a five-star hotel, such as a clubhouse, swimming pool, and range of recreational facilities, making your lifestyle better and offering the prospect for relaxation and social interaction. The complex has three designated covered carpark lots in the basement, ensuring your car parking for your vehicles.Safety is the highest concern in this complex, with CCTV cameras covering the entire area and well-trained security staff available to ensure your safety.LocalityStrategically located in Gurgaon, this apartment is close to all the facilities. Prominent schools such as Heritage School, Shri Ram School, and St. Xavier's School are within easy reach, making the location family-friendly. Worldmark and other shopping malls and complexes are easily accessible, offering facilities for shopping and dining.The public transport connectivity is also very good, with nearby metro and railway stations that facilitate easy commutes to work. Even buses and auto-rickshaws are easily available, which facilitate easy travel within the city.

You shall also enjoy the guarantee of 100% power backup to prevent any interruptions in your routine activities.Residents of THE SIXTY THREE benefit from a smorgasbord of amenities befitting a five-star hotel, such as a clubhouse, swimming pool, and range of recreational facilities, making your lifestyle better and offering the prospect for relaxation and social interaction. The complex has three designated covered carpark lots in the basement, ensuring your car parking for your vehicles.Safety is the highest concern in this complex, with CCTV cameras covering the entire area and well-trained security staff available to ensure your safety.LocalityStrategically located in Gurgaon, this apartment is close to all the facilities. Prominent schools such as Heritage School, Shri Ram School, and St. Xavier's School are within easy reach, making the location family-friendly. Worldmark and other shopping malls and complexes are easily accessible, offering facilities for shopping and dining.The public transport connectivity is also very good, with nearby metro and railway stations that facilitate easy commutes to work. Even buses and auto-rickshaws are easily available, which facilitate easy travel within the city.

Situated in a prime area of New Gurgaon, this 2 BHK flat in Sector 82 provides comfort, convenience and contemporary living. Buy this flat if you want to live a comfortable and memorable life with your family.Property Specifications - Situated on the 2nd floor of a 2-storey building, this corner unit is three sides open, receiving good natural light and fresh air during the day. It has a super built-up area of 1133 sq.ft. and a south face, hence bright and Vaastu compliant.The flat is equipped with two large bedrooms and two bathrooms one attached and one shared, both equipped with western fittings and geyser points. The house also has three balconies one for a bedroom, one for the living room, and one for the kitchen. All three balconies have shades to cover them for privacy as well as protection from the rain, and they have a view of greenery and the nearby park.Living and dining are clubbed into a single open area, ideal to lounge around and spend quality time with the family. The modular kitchen is equipped with overhead cabinets, piped gas connection, and a utility area extension, making it practical as well as convenient. Vitrified tile flooring has been incorporated throughout the home for a sleek, contemporary appearance.Facilities- The building has open parking, 24-hour water supply, 100 power backup, and a security guard for your safety. It is part of a calm and well-connected neighborhood, with easy access to everything you need.

Spanning 502 square yards, this plot is situated in one of Gurgaon's most esteemed neighborhoods, making it an ideal canvas for your dream home. Its unique combination of exclusivity, accessibility, and proximity to essential amenities sets it apart for residential development.Property Specifications and FacilitiesThis expansive plot provides ample space for creating a bespoke and lavish residence, with one side open for easy access right from the road. Set within a well-established community, the area boasts a tranquil atmosphere while reflecting an upscale neighborhood vibe. Governed by local construction regulations, the plot allows for creative architectural design while maintaining harmony within the vicinity, making it exclusively suitable for residential purposes. Equipped with vital utilities, this plot is ready for immediate construction. You can expect a continuous supply of water, electricity, and a reliable drainage system that enhances its appeal. Its west-facing orientation further adds to its desirability for residential projects, providing a perfect balance of comfort and aesthetic charm.LocalityLocated in the highly sought-after DLF City Phase 1, this plot is surrounded by a wealth of essential services. Renowned schools and high-quality hospitals are just a kilometer away, ensuring that educational and healthcare needs are easily met. For shopping and leisure, premier malls and supermarkets are only minutes away. Additionally, nearby banks and ATM centers cater to financial requirements, while the area boasts excellent public transport links, with the Yellow Line Metro Station conveniently located just 1.5 kilometers away. This prime location truly caters to a modern lifestyle!

Feel the luxury of living in this stunningly crafted 4 BHK apartment on sale at THE SIXTY THREE, a luxury residential complex in Sector 63, Gurgaon. Perfect for modern-day families, this expansive flat offers the ideal combination of luxury, convenience, and comfort.Property SpecificationsLocated on the 20th floor, this semi-furnished apartment has a spacious area to accommodate easy relaxation and entertainment. The apartment has four comfortable bedrooms, all beautifully crafted with comfort in mind. The master bedroom has classic Italian marble flooring, whereas the other bedrooms are completed with beautiful wooden flooring to create a cozy atmosphere.The apartment comes with four balconies, and every single one of them provides breathtaking vistas of the Aravalli hills, from where you can enjoy nature from the comfort of your own home. The modular kitchen is equipped with modern cabinets, chimney, hob, and piped gas supply to cook mouth-watering dishes to your heart's content.It is equipped with five bathrooms, all of a Western modern theme, and the modern fittings, such as geysers and shower cubicles, for extra convenience. The flat is Vaastu compliant, with the main door opening to the East, for a good living environment.FacilitiesThis apartment is well-fitted with basic electrical fittings like lights and fans to make living comfortable in the entire area. You shall also enjoy the guarantee of 100% power backup to prevent any interruptions in your routine activities.Residents of THE SIXTY THREE benefit from a smorgasbord of amenities befitting a five-star hotel, such as a clubhouse, swimming pool, and range of recreational facilities, making your lifestyle better and offering the prospect for relaxation and social interaction. The complex has three designated covered carpark lots in the basement, ensuring your car parking for your vehicles.Safety is the highest concern in this complex, with CCTV cameras covering the entire area and well-trained security staff available to ensure your safety.LocalityStrategically located in Gurgaon, this apartment is close to all the facilities. Prominent schools such as Heritage School, Shri Ram School, and St. Xavier's School are within easy reach, making the location family-friendly. Worldmark and other shopping malls and complexes are easily accessible, offering facilities for shopping and dining.The public transport connectivity is also very good, with nearby metro and railway stations that facilitate easy commutes to work. Even buses and auto-rickshaws are easily available, which facilitate easy travel within the city.

Surrounded by a green, peaceful environment, the property offers a perfect harmony of urban connectivity and serene living, making it an excellent choice for discerning homebuyers.

Situated in a prime area of New Gurgaon, this 2 BHK flat in Sector 82 provides comfort, convenience and contemporary living. Buy this flat if you want to live a comfortable and memorable life with your family.Property Specifications - Situated on the 2nd floor of a 2-storey building, this corner unit is three sides open, receiving good natural light and fresh air during the day. It has a super built-up area of 1133 sq.ft. and a south face, hence bright and Vaastu compliant.The flat is equipped with two large bedrooms and two bathrooms one attached and one shared, both equipped with western fittings and geyser points. The house also has three balconies one for a bedroom, one for the living room, and one for the kitchen. All three balconies have shades to cover them for privacy as well as protection from the rain, and they have a view of greenery and the nearby park.Living and dining are clubbed into a single open area, ideal to lounge around and spend quality time with the family. The modular kitchen is equipped with overhead cabinets, piped gas connection, and a utility area extension, making it practical as well as convenient. Vitrified tile flooring has been incorporated throughout the home for a sleek, contemporary appearance.Facilities- The building has open parking, 24-hour water supply, 100 power backup, and a security guard for your safety. It is part of a calm and well-connected neighborhood, with easy access to everything you need.
